feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.4.6
entry.content:
• Just getting more feedback for scheduler. Does not execute yet. Tracking scrolling down in desktop mode is an issue for that page only.

What's Changed

  • Fix011 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/408 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.4.3...6.4.6

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.4.7
entry.content:
Apps now have their own API control settings, no more universal setting. By default, each app will be at 20... so make sure you update each app for the numbers you would like. Note a new scheduler section is added; it doesn't execute yet but play with it and provide some feedback. You'll be able to add resume, pause and API speed limits on your schedule (per app)!

New location for apps

And in the logs it works!

Schedule Demo

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.4.6...6.4.7

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: Huntarr v3.006
New release for Huntarr: Huntarr v3.007
New release for Huntarr: 6.5.0
entry.content:
Welcome to 6.5.0

  • Scheduling [Enable/Disable] between different apps (or all apps/global) now works (For request: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/359)
  • Scheduling [API Limits] between different apps (or all alpps/global) now works (For request: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/359)
  • Side bar cleaned up for easy navigation view
  • Apps view for desktop; scrolling too far down no longer causes going into a large blank area (contained)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.4.7...6.5.0
